text: is there a way to update just specific columns of existing HubDB rows via a CSV import?

Hello! For one of my clients, we have project and team pages being pulled in through HubDB dynamic pages and modules. These modules appear in several spots throughout the site. I ran an SEO check through HubSpot and it came up with each of these dynamic pages having duplicate content. Is there a way to avoid duplicate content?
So I did try setting that in HubDB, but might have done it incorrectly. Do I need the full url string? Or just the extension?
I have it set like this:
When creating dynamic pages, is it possible to allow drag and drop editing for each page? Can each unique page actually be created and show up in the Website pages editor?
did you select that column in the meta description configuration? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/hubdb>
also make sure that you then always point that content to the same canonical URL
Hello! I'm wondering if it's possible to code a dynamic blog post template in HubSpot? We'd like to change out the headline and first paragraph depending on a visitors' origination source.
